text: Cecilie Enger (born 21 February 1963) is a Norwegian journalist, novelist and children's writer. She was born in Oslo. Her literary breakthrough was the novel Brødrene Henriksen from 2000. She was awarded the Norwegian Booksellers' Prize in 2013 for her autobiographical novel Mors Gaver. Enger works as journalist for the newspaper Dagens Næringsliv. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Oslo Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Norwegian women novelists Category:Norwegian children's writers Category:20th-century Norwegian novelists Category:21st-century Norwegian novelists Category:21st-century Norwegian women writers Category:20th-century Norwegian women writers
title: Cecilie Enger
